name: 陳政順
objective: 先修課程：3001011或負責教授同意。介紹結構體在受到張力、壓力、剪力、扭力及彎曲等外力狀態下之變形，分析應力、應變及變形，莫耳圓、壓力容器、樑、柱。
schedule:
1. Introduction
2. Concept of stress and strain
3. Axial load
4. Torsion
5. Bending
6. Transverse shaer
7.Stress transformation
8. column.
scorePolicy: 平時作業& 課堂表現 25 % ,小考 15 %, 期中考 25%, 期末考 35%
materials: Mechanics of material by R.C.Hibbeler 7th SI edition, Pearson Education South Asia Pte Ltd
